name: freudenberg.consulting
goal: freudenberg.consulting is a public-affairs agency based in Germany. It offers strategic consulting services and information of EU policy making.
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Development, Energy, Enlargement, Enterprise, External Relations, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Transport
euInitiatives: Especially EU Energy, Climate and Environment policies and related topics. Main files: Clean Energy Package (Market Design, RED II, EED II, EPBD, ...), EU ETS and EU Urban agenda / Smart Cities.
